review: She is so humble , reliable and friendly .My experience was very good . I'm mother of two children one is my daughter and one is my son both was from normal delivery. Recently delivered a baby boy via normal delivery. She was extra caring at the time of delivery. She was always available for all my queries. I would recommend everyone to consult this doctor and get best advice all the time . *** ** * **** ****** ****** ******* ******

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
First of all, I am Pharmacist by education and working for Pharmaceutical industry with around 10 years of experience.

We consulted Dr. Geeta for easy and fast outcome from situation but Dr. started suggesting to go for scan, listed out her process.  To me, nothing sounded satisfactory. *** **** ***** **** **** *** ** ******* **** **** ********* ** **** *** **** ****** *** ************* ******* ******* **** ** ******************* *** ****** ******* *** *********** ********* ***** **** ************ ******** **** *** ** ** *** ************ *****
Doctor mention of 3000/- charges just to prescribe medicine. As a patient, we should blindly believe Doctor and follow what they recommend but this is not possible in all cases. * ***** ***** *** ***** ****** ********* **** ** ********

To many of my queries the responses from doctor were unsatisfying.

They have mentioned of 200/- as consultation charges but actually charged 500/-. When I questioned the same, the response was very unprofessional.

I would recommend to visit the doctor/clinic only when you have emergency or you are left with no other option.

Doctor is so humble but surprised to see the receptionist behaviour when one emergency case visited this hospital in Amruthahalli and the reception lady was asking to take an appointments and come next day to one serious lady patient.  
No value for life that's what I feel here.  
I dont recommended any emergency cases to this hospital.
Reliable and friendly doctor...answers all queries patiently and most importantly not money minded ....worth visiting
Doctor is very patient.. listen to all the concerns.. she is soo approachable all the time.. I would recommend this doctor to every one..
